Solving for Zero

When you think of climate change, it probably feels like a daunting topic. We’re constantly hearing about all the reasons to be worried, but what about the progress we’re making? Join your host, Noah Megregian, as he brings in leaders of climate tech organizations to discuss the stories behind the solutions. From the technology that's making headlines to the business models that are changing the game, they'll explore it all. Whether you're looking for more meaning in your work, or simply passionate about creating a better future, this podcast is for you. Tune in every other Thursday!
